Text:
Are there English subtitles for this?
Thanks
I don't find any subtitle! But it can be somewhere.

Downloaded this, with the intent to use Subtitles 1.1, a sub search app, thats flawlessly delivered the correlative subs, twice now since installing the other night, reducing this taxing crusade, to a zero effort, checksum defined afterthought, posthaste if not virtually instantaneous.

Tonight however, faced with this otherwise challenging german translation, its come up empty.

There are subs available on the web: google by the film's name + "subs".

BTW, a message to BTARENA.org, GO STICK YOUR LABEL ON YOUR ARSE, NOT ON THE FILM!!

BTARENA.org==SHITE!!!
Achtung: the spoken language is Polish, not German.
